title: The #1 and only Leader in Worlds Pick 'Em
body: I would love to know the only person in "Baron Nashor" rank for Pick 'Ems. Also how lucky or skilled they are. Reveal yourself!!!

replies.body: I assume it's a person with multiple accs to give different probabilities

Seems unlikely. Otherwise his accounts have wildly different pick'ems.
It is just super unlikely so why waste your time that way. At some point you have to say this is the bracket I am going with.

Well yea it would have wildly different pick ems, thats the point of having multiple accs.

I know one person who has 5 accs for pickems, but he's a potato.

It just doesn't make a lot of logical sense. 

You have to be confident in your picks.
If you have 5 accounts. Do you do 5 different group stages?? Or do you do 1 group stage? Either you are throwing away 4 accounts or all 5. Even then, If you do commit to 5 different groups then the multiaccount can work. 

You can argue 3 of one group, 2 of another group. So maybe 3 get through. But what he said SSG in 1 of them and LZ in 2??

It just doesn't make sense.

I think a lot of it probably skill, but surely some luck.

Dude has balls of steel too.
well he is from LAN said from Dash
